description:
The Straw Hats and CP0 relentlessly attack the Seraphim, but the Seraphim keep getting back up. Then, Zoro notices that the Seraphim remind him of someone who he fought before. Meanwhile, Shaka goes to check one place where he thinks Vegapunk Stella might be.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ikinokore! Saikyou no Jinrui to no Shitou
Pour survivre. Combat acharné contre les surhommes !
Survive! Deadly Combat with the Strongest Form of Humanity!
Übertlebt! – Todeskampf gegen die Stärksten der Menschheit
النّجاة! معركة مميتة ضدّ أقوى أشكال البشريّة!
生き残れ! 最強の人類との死闘
